comment.author: 29418639@N06
comment._content: WWI. Mobilization of the Dutch army in the Dutch East-Indies (Indonesia). East-Indian troups marching, on the left a Japanese field kitchen drawn by small native horses. 1915.

comment.author: 29877325@N07
comment._content: Awesome and sad at the same time. Many lives were lost in the Great War (World War I)
